title: nenjam ellaam
sahitya:
nenjamellaam niRaindhaai anjana vaNNa
neela mEga syaamaLa  thiruvaLar maarbaa en      
[nenjam]


anupallavi

chanchalangal thavirppaai sathya swaroopaa thiru
manjana meniyil maalaigaL saaRRI  en 
[nenjam]

caraNam

sinnanchiRiyEn seipizhai poRuththarulvaai
pannaga sayanaa paarkadal naadhanE
minnidaiyaaL naayagaa mEga varNa ranjananE
svarNa maya dhEva vaNNamyil annai boomiyudan en   
[nenjam]
